answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello, Rosemary.
This is a personnel manual which includes a section on ethics: 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302343/City_of_Hays_Personnel_Manual
This is just the ethics section of a personnel manual:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5917/Ethics_Section_Personnel_Policies_and_Employee_Responsibilities_City_of_Ashland_Oregon
Another one here:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6227/Code_of_Ethics_City_of_San_Luis_Obispo_California
And here:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4871/Ethics_Handbook_City_of_Phoenix_Arizona
This is a broader view of ethics in the nonprofit sector.  It details indicators of a healthy organization and methods for creating strong ethics policies:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3614/Standards_for_Excellence_An_Ethics_and_Accountability_Code_for_the_Nonprofit_Sector
I hope this answers your question!
Gabriel Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
gbrehm@ICMA.org


Hello, Rosemary.

This is a personnel manual which includes a section on ethics: 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302343/City_of_Hays_Personnel_Manual

This is just the ethics section of a personnel manual:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5917/Ethics_Section_Personnel_Policies_and_Employee_Responsibilities_City_of_Ashland_Oregon

Another one here:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6227/Code_of_Ethics_City_of_San_Luis_Obispo_California

And here:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4871/Ethics_Handbook_City_of_Phoenix_Arizona

This is a broader view of ethics in the nonprofit sector.  It details indicators of a healthy organization and methods for creating strong ethics policies:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3614/Standards_for_Excellence_An_Ethics_and_Accountability_Code_for_the_Nonprofit_Sector

I hope this answers your question!

Gabriel Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
gbrehm@ICMA.org

author: Rosemary Kulow
text: Do you have model ethics policies for public employees?
title: Town Manager
